hero.about: I'm Jonas Dias. Determination and consistency in studies have shaped my journey as a developer. Proficient in Java, Spring Boot, and React, I am currently pursuing the 6th semester of Systems Analysis and Development at IFBA. Enthusiastic about learning and continuously growing, I'm ready to tackle challenges and contribute with quality and efficiency to development projects.

stringhini.title: Data Quality at Stringhini
stringhini.description: As the Data Quality, my responsibilities include recording, identifying, and categorizing products within the company's system. Additionally, I am committed to ensuring the integrity and accuracy of information.

about.description1: Hello! I'm Jonas, a technology enthusiast and developer specializing in Java, Spring Boot, and React. With extensive experience in web application development and a strong commitment to excellence, I'm constantly seeking challenges that drive my professional growth.
about.description2: To me, technology goes beyond codes and algorithms. It's the art of finding innovative solutions to complex problems. I'm always exploring new creative ways to approach challenges and pursue exceptional results.
about.description3: I'm excited to collaborate with talented teams on challenging projects, where my experience and passion for continuous learning can add value.

note_cards.title: Note Cards
note_cards.description: The Note Cards project exemplifies my technical skills by integrating the backend developed in Java and Spring Boot, and the frontend with React and TypeScript. This project not only demonstrates my ability in backend/frontend integration but also highlights my capability to provide cohesive software solutions.

tech_store.title: Tech Store
tech_store.description: The Tech Store app integrates Java and Spring Boot for the backend, Angular for the frontend, and PostgreSQL as the database. The backend strictly adheres to Clean Architecture principles, ensuring a modular and easily maintainable codebase. Docker is used to containerize the entire project for easy deployment.
